description.value:
The refreshing air inside this container fills your lungs far more fully than its volume would suggest.

Level: 4
Category: Alchemical Item
Time: 30 min.
Component Cost: See Alchemical Item
Formula Cost: 160 gp
Key Skill: Healing or Nature

Utility Power âœ¦ Consumable (Minor Action)

Effect: You inhale the contents of the container. Until the start of your next short or extended rest, you gain a +5 item bonus to Endurance checks to avoid suffocation.

Level 14: +7 item bonus.

Level 24: +10 item bonus.



Published in Into the Unknown: The Dungeon Survival Handbook, page(s) 117.
